description: This file defines a React context and provider component for managing theme preferences (light, dark, or system) in a React Native application. It handles persisting user theme choice, reacting to system theme changes, and provides theme data to child components.

classes.name: ThemeProvider
classes.description: A React functional component that manages and provides theme state and switching logic.

methods.name: useThemeSettings
methods.description: Custom hook to access theme context.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: React component that supplies theme context to its children with persistence and system theme awareness.
